casebody.data:
DAWSON MECHANICAL CONTRACTING, Plaintiff,
v.
Harold S. GURVEY and Amy Gurvey, Defendants-Movants,
and
State Farm Fire and Casualty, et al., Defendant. M-998/999/1000 September Term 2017
078953 Supreme Court of New Jersey. April 24, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-998) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motions to expand the record (M-999) and for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-1000) are denied.
